name: generate_docs
description:
Generate README documentation for XSIAM content.

Creates:
- Command documentation with examples
- Input/output specifications
- Use case descriptions
- Playbook images (for playbooks)

Run after content passes validation.

input_path.description: Path to the YAML file (integration, script, or playbook)

output_dir.description: Output directory for README. Defaults to same directory as input
